thread.title: Usain Bolt insiste: "Creo que le puedo ser útil a Mourinho en el Manchester United"
thread.title_full: Usain Bolt insiste: "Creo que le puedo ser útil a Mourinho en el Manchester United"

author: marca.com
title: Usain Bolt insiste: "Creo que le puedo ser útil a Mourinho en el Manchester United"
text:
Usain Bolt insists: I could be useful for Mourinho at Manchester United RTRPIX Shared Updated 15/02/2017 20:21 CET 
A fter flirting with coaching at Real Madrid, claiming to be a follower of Cristiano Ronaldo, Usain Bolt has suggested, with his tongue firmly in his cheek, that he could do a job for Jose Mourinho at Manchester United . 
During the Laureus awards gala in Monte Carlo, the sprinter talked about his future plans. 
"I have the opportunity to train with Borussia Dortmund, and it would be a good opportunity," he said. 
"After I retire my life will be empty. 
"I will write things down on paper and start from the top of the list, set one target and then another. 
"I always wanted to try football and I think I can reach the level of Wayne Rooney. 
"I play on the wing and I think it could be useful to Mourinho." BEST OF MARCA
